attributes.action: Use the resources of UK shipyards / steelworks to build wind turbines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that we use the skills / resources of the UK to commence building the wind turbines we need to reduce our carbon footprint whilst at the same time protecting jobs / skills and keeping investment in the UK. We have the skills in our shipyards, steel works and turbine manufacturers to become world leaders producing the number of offshore wind turbines the country needs to meet it's climate change commitments whilst at the same time protecting jobs (Corus etc) and helping the balance of payments by not purchasing in Euro's from abroad.
